title: Drummer Hoff
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel, William L Snyder, Kratky Film and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: This film is a lively folk verse about the building of a cannon called Sultan. Brightly dressed in full uniform each soldier brings a part of the remarkable machine. Based on the book by Ed and Barbara Emberley and adapted by Gene Deitch.
creator_credit_for_label: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel, William L Snyder, Kratky Film and Weston Woods Studios
